code: @Manual{,   title = {swisspalmR: Access SwissPalm data},   author = {Simon Parker},   year = {2023},   note = {https://github.com/simpar1471/swisspalmR/, https://simpar1471.github.io/swisspalmR/}, }

title: Access SwissPalm data
text: swisspalmR small package one purpose: retrieves S-palmiotylation data SwissPalm database using httr2, rvest curl.

title: Access SwissPalm data
text: can install development version swisspalmR GitHub :

title: Access SwissPalm data
text: query SwissPalm database, get protein accessions vector. proteins must supported SwissPalm, .e. UniProt AC, UniProt secondary AC, UniProt ID, UniProt gene name, Ensembl protein, Ensembl gene, Refseq protein ID, IPI ID, UniGene ID, PomBase ID, MGI ID, RGD ID, TAIR protein ID, EuPathDb ID. vector can check SwissPalm swissPalm() function ’ll get back dataframe rows protein ID supplied function, detailing various aspects S-palmitoylation protein SwissPalm. example: can test protein accessions specific datasets species SwissPalm using dataset species parameters. Valid values dataset species can found package objects swisspalmR::datasets swisspalmR::species. Note swissPalm() memoised - results cached returned inputs provided swissPalm() one session. way, SwissPalm can return results users faster. want swissPalm() functions ‘forget’ previous results, use memoise::forget(swissPalm) .
code: protein_ids <- c("P05067", "O00161", "P04899", "P98019") swisspalmR::swissPalm(protein_ids) #>   Query identifier Found UniProt AC  UniProt ID   Organism #> 1           O00161 found     O00161 SNP23_HUMAN H. sapiens #> 2           P04899 found     P04899 GNAI2_HUMAN H. sapiens #> 3           P05067 found     P05067    A4_HUMAN H. sapiens #> 4           P98019 found     P98019  COX2_ANAPL    M. duck #>                                  Protein name Found in palmitoyl-proteomes #> 1 Synaptosomal-associated protein 23, SNAP-23                        20/22 #> 2        Guanine nucleotide-binding protein G                        17/22 #> 3         Amyloid-beta precursor protein, APP                         2/22 #> 4  Cytochrome c oxidase subunit 2, EC 7.1.1.9                          0/0 #>   Techniques Times validated #> 1          4               4 #> 2          4               7 #> 3          2               4 #> 4          0               0 #>                                                    DHHC-PATs & APTs Sites #> 1                                                                       6 #> 2 ZDHC3_MOUSE, ZDHC7_MOUSE, ZDHC2_MOUSE, ZDH21_MOUSE\n  LYPA1_HUMAN     3 #> 3                ZDHC7_MOUSE, ZDH21_MOUSE, ZDHC7_HUMAN, ZDH21_HUMAN     2 #> 4                                                                       0 #>   Predicted sites Cys Orthologs #> 1             Yes   6       Yes #> 2             Yes  11       Yes #> 3             Yes  18       Yes #> 4              No   3        No # Checking against only mallard ducks mallard <- swisspalmR::species["Mallard duck"] spalm_data_only_mallards <- swisspalmR::swissPalm(protein_ids,                                                    species = mallard) head(spalm_data_only_mallards) #>   Query identifier                 Found UniProt AC UniProt ID Organism #> 1           P98019                 found     P98019 COX2_ANAPL  M. duck #> 2             <NA> not found in database       <NA>       <NA>     <NA> #> 3             <NA> not found in database       <NA>       <NA>     <NA> #> 4             <NA> not found in database       <NA>       <NA>     <NA> #>                                 Protein name Found in palmitoyl-proteomes #> 1 Cytochrome c oxidase subunit 2, EC 7.1.1.9                          0/0 #> 2                                       <NA>                         <NA> #> 3                                       <NA>                         <NA> #> 4                                       <NA>                         <NA> #>   Techniques Times validated Sites Predicted sites Cys Orthologs #> 1          0               0     0              No   3        No #> 2         NA              NA    NA            <NA>  NA      <NA> #> 3         NA              NA    NA            <NA>  NA      <NA> #> 4         NA              NA    NA            <NA>  NA      <NA> #>   Query.identifier #> 1             <NA> #> 2           O00161 #> 3           P04899 #> 4           P05067

title: Access SwissPalm data
text: Using input vector 100 values may cause table returned row proteins query. can get around splitting protein ID vector list vectors length < 100, running list apply() purrr::map(). , please use Sys.sleep() force R wait making requests, thereby prevent likelihood overwhelming SwissPalm server.

title: Access SwissPalm data
text: SwissPalm website offers downloads palmitoylation data three forms: text, Excel, FASTA. hope emulate behaviour extra functions, now able represent necessary HTTP commands R.

title: Access SwissPalm data
text: SwissPalm database available Creative Commons -NC-ND license. SwissPalm reference: SwissPalm: Protein Palmitoylation database. Mathieu Blanc, Fabrice P.. David, Laurence Abrami, Daniel Migliozzi, Florence Armand, Jérôme Burgi F. Gisou van der Goot. F1000Research.

what: Mappings for dataset parameter in swissPalm() — datasets
title: Mappings for dataset parameter in swissPalm() — datasets
text: 7-length character vector corresponding names available value dataset swissPalm()

title: Mappings for dataset parameter in swissPalm() — datasets
code: swisspalmR::datasets[1:5] #>                                                                                  Dataset 1: All proteins  #>                                                                                                    "all"  #>                                                        Dataset 2: Proteins predicted to be palmitoylated  #>                                                                                                   "pred"  #>      Dataset 3: Palmitoylation validated or found in at least 1 palmitoyl-proteome (SwissPalm annotated)  #>                                                                                                   "palm"  #>                                                             Dataset 4: Palmitoylation validated proteins  #>                                                                                                   "targ"  #> Dataset 5: Palmitoylation validated proteins or found in palmitoyl-proteomes using 2 independent methods  #>                                                                                                   "meth"

what: Mappings for species parameter in swissPalm() — species
title: Mappings for species parameter in swissPalm() — species
text: 92-length character vector corresponding names available value species swissPalm().

title: Mappings for species parameter in swissPalm() — species
code: swisspalmR::species[1:5] #> All species in SwissPalm             Homo sapiens             Mus musculus  #>                       ""                      "1"                      "2"  #>        Rattus norvegicus Saccharomyces cerevisiae  #>                      "3"                      "6"

what: Retrieve palmitoylation data from the swissPalm database — swissPalm
title: Retrieve palmitoylation data from the swissPalm database — swissPalm
Retrieve palmitoylation data from the swissPalm database — swissPalm
Retrieve palmitoylation data from the swissPalm database — swissPalm
text: protein_id Character vector protein identifiers. ID type supported SwissPalm (UniProt AC, UniProt secondary AC, UniProt ID, UniProt gene name, Ensembl protein, Ensembl gene, Refseq protein ID, IPI ID, UniGene ID, PomBase ID, MGI ID, RGD ID, TAIR protein ID, EuPathDb ID; SwissPalm website). dataset dataset use swissPalm. set "" value swisspalm::datasets. Default = "" (datasets). species dataset use swissPalm. set "" value swisspalm::species. Default = "" (datasets).

title: Retrieve palmitoylation data from the swissPalm database — swissPalm
text: Data frame palmitoylation data proteins protein_id, notes proteins found SwissPalm.

title: Retrieve palmitoylation data from the swissPalm database — swissPalm
code: swisspalmR::swissPalm(protein_id = c("P05067", "O00161", "P04899", "P98019")) #>   Query identifier Found UniProt AC  UniProt ID   Organism #> 1           O00161 found     O00161 SNP23_HUMAN H. sapiens #> 2           P04899 found     P04899 GNAI2_HUMAN H. sapiens #> 3           P05067 found     P05067    A4_HUMAN H. sapiens #> 4           P98019 found     P98019  COX2_ANAPL    M. duck #>                                  Protein name Found in palmitoyl-proteomes #> 1 Synaptosomal-associated protein 23, SNAP-23                        20/22 #> 2        Guanine nucleotide-binding protein G                        17/22 #> 3         Amyloid-beta precursor protein, APP                         2/22 #> 4  Cytochrome c oxidase subunit 2, EC 7.1.1.9                          0/0 #>   Techniques Times validated #> 1          4               4 #> 2          4               7 #> 3          2               4 #> 4          0               0 #>                                                    DHHC-PATs & APTs Sites #> 1                                                                       6 #> 2 ZDHC3_MOUSE, ZDHC7_MOUSE, ZDHC2_MOUSE, ZDH21_MOUSE\n  LYPA1_HUMAN     3 #> 3                ZDHC7_MOUSE, ZDH21_MOUSE, ZDHC7_HUMAN, ZDH21_HUMAN     2 #> 4                                                                       0 #>   Predicted sites Cys Orthologs #> 1             Yes   6       Yes #> 2             Yes  11       Yes #> 3             Yes  18       Yes #> 4              No   3        No  # Use 'species' parameter to limit your results to those for a species of  # interest swisspalmR::swissPalm(   protein_id = c("P05067", "O00161", "P04899", "P98019"),   species = swisspalmR::species["Mallard duck"]   ) #>   Query identifier                 Found UniProt AC UniProt ID Organism #> 1           P98019                 found     P98019 COX2_ANAPL  M. duck #> 2             <NA> not found in database       <NA>       <NA>     <NA> #> 3             <NA> not found in database       <NA>       <NA>     <NA> #> 4             <NA> not found in database       <NA>       <NA>     <NA> #>                                 Protein name Found in palmitoyl-proteomes #> 1 Cytochrome c oxidase subunit 2, EC 7.1.1.9                          0/0 #> 2                                       <NA>                         <NA> #> 3                                       <NA>                         <NA> #> 4                                       <NA>                         <NA> #>   Techniques Times validated Sites Predicted sites Cys Orthologs #> 1          0               0     0              No   3        No #> 2         NA              NA    NA            <NA>  NA      <NA> #> 3         NA              NA    NA            <NA>  NA      <NA> #> 4         NA              NA    NA            <NA>  NA      <NA> #>   Query.identifier #> 1             <NA> #> 2           O00161 #> 3           P04899 #> 4           P05067

title: swisspalmR: Access SwissPalm data — swisspalmR-package
text: Accesses S-palmityolation data 'SwissPalm'. `SwissPalm` credit: Mathieu Blanc*, Fabrice P.. David, Laurence Abrami, Daniel Migliozzi, Florence Armand, Jérôme Bürgi F. Gisou van der Goot (2015), doi:10.12688/f1000research.6464.1 .

text: development: swissPalm() function getting data frames palmitoylation data SwissPalm database
